summary: A young Nord woman serving in the Imperial Legion. Fights with sword and bow. Unique hair, unique textures, standalone CNHF body (can be switched out for UNP).
descriptionHtml:
Ari is a fairly recent creation of mine but I love her a lot. I decided to package her up and release her as a follower to test my mod-making skills. Please, if there are issues with her tell me and I will try to fix them.

She's around 25 years old. She used to be a thief, but chose serving in the Imperial Legion over rotting in jail. She uses the same voicetype as Aela the Huntress and Legate Rikke. She will level with you up to level 100 and is Essential.

Her default body type is the [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/44979/?]CNHF 2.5[/url] body, but you can switch it out for a UNP family body if you desire. The CNHF just goes better with her overall aesthetic in my humble opinion.

When creating her face, I wanted to steer away from the "doe-eyed delicate beauty" type that seems so popular, so please don't say things like she's ugly or should be better-looking. She's supposed to look more "real." Her facial structure took me a while to do in RaceMenu and I'm kind of proud of it, so please try to be nice.

[img]https://78.media.tumblr.com/cdb8d899990957b2021540510c1a2937/tumblr_p4jk9hQ6lB1sjmkkro2_1280.png[/img]

Please note: In my images, she has scars that are not present in this release. I do not have permission to use them currently. Her skin textures are exactly the same, just minus the scars. Sorry!

I recommend these mods if you want to accessorize her, as I use them in my own game with her:

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74568/?]Relationship Dialogue Overhaul[/url] (gives her more things to say)
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65359/?]Big Leather Backpack[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33391/?]Face Masks of Skyrim[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20900/?]Bandanas of Skyrim[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/78293]Colovian Fur Armor[/url]
author: Miriam
